name: Shadow Mother
description:
A dream can be a lot of things to people. It can be useless, it can be a wonderland, or it can be a simple sequence of events.  On some events, dreams can be a way of communication to the person from things that know more then us. 

Rose has been getting all these weird dreams, and being around a bunch of people who basically look down on most of the weird quirks of life because of a large incident in the past doesn't do her too good. She will soon see a hint of what the future holds, and what her mother has been working on for most of her life with the title "The Shadow Mother." Not much happens, but everything unfold to her in the future. For better, or for the worse.

Credits;  

Title Menu - Lucas King

Calming lofi - Syros

Melancholia music box - Ryan Creep

Night Come Creeping - Life and Death Productions

Light Piano Music - Relaxdaily

The last of His Name - BrunuhVille

Waiting Music - Recording IK

Heartbeat - Argsound

Quirky Music Instrumental - Blanket Barricade

Motivational Background - bdProductions
